Reference

All functions

add_plot_header()

Add a logo to a plot

check_fonts_in_r()

Test if fonts are available on the system and import them in R

create_header_html_gouv()

create html_gouv bootstrap header

gglogo()

Create a graphical object from a logo file

gitbook_gouv()

The gouvdown GitBook output format

gouv_colors()

Colors vector

gouv_palettes

Colors palettes for France design system

html_gouv()

gouvdown HTML document

list_logos()

List available logos

load_fonts()

Load installed fonts

logo_file_path()

Get the path to the logo file in the package directory

scale_color_gouv_continuous()

Continuous color scale

scale_color_gouv_discrete()

Discrete color scale

scale_fill_gouv_continuous()

Continuous fill scale

scale_fill_gouv_discrete()

Discrete fill scale

theme_gouv()

ggplot2 theme with French government design template

theme_gouv_map()

ggplot2 theme for map with French government design template

theme_grey_gouv()

ggplot2 grey theme with French government design template
